column5: Apply for this programmeJoin the next generation of data scientists and meet the challenges of the Information Age with our MSc Data Science and Advanced Computing.On this course, you’ll work with experts from the Department of Computer Science to develop in-depth knowledge of:data analysis and data-driven knowledge discoverycloud computingmachine learning and artificial intelligenceThis knowledge is vital. Computer science is driving our digital transformation; it is at the forefront of scientific discovery and the heart of economic growth. Utilising society’s wealth of data requires people who can blend research, technology and ingenuity.
column7: New UK/Republic of Ireland students: £12,550  New international students: £26,950
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
